title: Qureshi condoles death of Sardar Sikandar Hayat
content:
In a message of condolence, he prayed Allah Almighty to rest the departed soul in eternal peace and grant courage to the bereaved family to bear the loss with fortitude.He said that services of Sardar Sikandar Hayat for the cause of Kashmir will be remembered for all times to come.
